description.en:
It's a phone! Is this an incident? In search of a reward, we're on the move!!
The fifth installment of Hiroo Terada's complete works
is ``Wanpaku Reporter,'' which depicts the growth of a boy who dreams of becoming a newspaper reporter!

Contains the one-shot "Thriller Baseball Stadium" and "Time-kun" at the same time!

Synopsis
<Wanpaku Reporter>
Shirayuki Ichinomiya joins Tokudane Shimbun with an ambition to become a first-class reporter.
He receives the nickname "Wanpaku" from the editor-in-chief and pursues her dream. Take the first step 
He is a naughty reporter whose only strength is his energy, but he tackles robberies and murders with all his might!
<Thriller Stadium>
During the traditional game between the Giants and the Tigers, the batter
died after being hit by a pitch to the head...
That night, I heard the sound of a ball being hit from the field where no one was supposed to be ! A full-fledged suspense work where mysteries become mysteries.


<Time-kun> Time- kun, the strikeout king and error king, has a hard time getting anyone to join him even though he wants to play his favorite baseball game.
Even though he manages to get a team of adults to join him, it doesn't work out because of his serious personality. At that moment, a mysterious gentleman
appears...
